<title level="1" right="Trait">[Merfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=227)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 347</row>

These aquatic humanoids have an upper body similar to a human and a lower body similar to a fish.
name: Merfolk
